subject: Add scale animation to viewer-stats on enter
body:
Added 3-second enter animation to viewer-stats component that plays after defer/placeholder transition:
- 0-1.5s: Blur removal (continuing from placeholder)
- 1.5-2.25s: Scale grows by 25%
- 2.25-3s: Scale returns to original size

Simplified viewer-stats-loading to use basic blur transitions with animate.enter/leave API.

Also updated cursor chat placeholder text to "Send a chat" for clarity.

subject: Add star reward system and help menu tasks
body:
Added two new tasks to the task list:

Task 72: Implement Star Reward System
- Star display component in bottom right above "last updated"
- Interaction tracking for clicks, scrolls, and other actions
- Hover effects with dynamic tooltip messages
- Progressive animations at 5, 10, and 25 stars
- Special code system integration with / chat command
- Bonus stars for contact info requests and special codes
- Persistent star count using localStorage

Task 73: Update Help Menu for / Command
- Documentation showing / can be used for chat or special codes
- Visual feedback (glow/loading) when code is recognized
- Disable input during code processing
- Integration with star system special codes

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
author: Mannan Javid

subject: Revert "Transform dots to shimmering stars in Snake Eyes"
body: This reverts commit 11f1e13bbcf0a5832963c9fe670552af94bb971f.
author: Mannan Javid

subject: Transform dots to shimmering stars in Snake Eyes
body:
- Change circles to star shapes using clip-path polygon
- Reduce size from 10px to 6px for more subtle effect
- Add shimmer animation with varying opacity and glow
- Stagger animation delays using nth-child selectors
- Increase base opacity to 0.8 for better visibility
- Add drop-shadow filter for star glow effect

The stars now twinkle at different intervals creating a more
dynamic and magical starfield effect.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
author: Mannan Javid

subject: Add Snake Eyes interactive background feature
body:
- Create ouroboros snake icon for toggle button
- Add snake eyes state to NgRx store
- Implement interactive grid with dots that follow cursor
- Add click animation with color wave effect
- Position toggle in bottom-left corner
- Use smaller dots (10px) in semi-transparent squares (30px)
- Fix ViewEncapsulation to support dynamically created elements

Features:
- Grid of subtle dots that follow mouse movement
- Click creates colorful wave animation across dots
- Toggle on/off with ouroboros icon
- Layered behind content (z-index 0)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
author: Mannan Javid

subject: Refactor modals to use NgRx and centralize in app component
body:
- Move contact and dev stats modals to app component template
- Add modal state to NgRx store (open/close, active tab, results)
- Create actions, reducers, and selectors for modal state management
- Simplify component logic to dispatch actions instead of local state
- Fix z-index stacking context issues by removing z-index from containers
- Modals now render as siblings to content, not children of positioned elements

Benefits:
- Single source of truth for modal state
- Cleaner separation of concerns
- No CSS stacking context conflicts
- Both modals properly appear above header

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
author: Mannan Javid
